title: Enhancing C–S and C–N bond formation with ultrasound assistance: lipase-catalyzed synthesis of 2,4-disubstituted thiazole derivatives from arylethanones and thioamides
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,21213-21218
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03290J, Paper

Priya Mahaur, Khushbu Rajput, Vishal Singh, Vandana Srivastava, Sundaram Singh
A novel approach for the lipase-catalyzed synthesis of 2,4-disubstituted thiazoles from arylethanones and thioamide under ultrasonication in water as a green reaction medium.
